General.Name: Vuno Inc.
General.Description: Vuno Inc. operates as a medical artificial intelligence (AI) solution development company. The company provides medical AI solutions for analyzing various medical data and assisting in disease diagnosis. Its products include BoneAge, an AI diagnostic software for bone age assessment; DeepBrain, a brain parcellation for the quantitative analysis of neurodegenerative diseases and other neurological disorders; chest X-ray, a diagnostic support system for abnormalities in chest x-ray; fundus AI, an AI-based screening solution for various abnormalities in the fundus of the eye; and LungCT AI, an AI-based pulmonary lung nodule detection and reporting system. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
